---

## URLs

| ENV         | URL                                                  |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Live        | [api.oktus.io](https://api.oktus.io)                 |
| Staging     | [staging.api.oktus.io](https://staging.api.oktus.io) |
| Development | [dev.api.oktus.io](https://dev.api.oktus.io)         |

## Build Setup

```bash
# Install dependencies
$ pnpm i

# Serve with hot reload at localhost:3000
$ pnpm dev

# Serve with hot reload at localhost:3000 + serverless functions from /api (requires Vercel CLI)
$ pnpm dev:vc

# Add + commit changes (linting + conventional changelog)
$ pnpm commit

# Deploy changes
$ git push
# OR
$ git push origin [branch]

```
